023package org.opt4j.core.config;
024
025import java.util.Collection;
026
027import com.google.inject.ImplementedBy;
028import com.google.inject.Module;
029
030/**
031 * The {@link ModuleList} offers a method to obtain a {@link Collection} of
032 * {@link Module}s.
033 * 
034 * @author lukasiewycz
035 * 
036 */
037@ImplementedBy(ModuleAutoFinder.class)
038public interface ModuleList {
039
040        /**
041         * Returns the classes of all modules.
042         * 
043         * @return the classes of all modules
044         */
045        public Collection<Class<? extends Module>> getModules();
046
047}
